name: Miami Airport Marriott
address: 1201 NW Le Jeune Road, Building A, Miami, FL 33126
description: Discover the perfect combination of style and comfort at Miami Airport Marriott, our recently redesigned MIA hotel near the most compelling attractions. Unwind in spacious, sleek hotel accommodations with generously appointed modern amenities, plush bedding, high-speed Wi-Fi and well-lit workspaces. Explore nearby attractions from our hotel in Miami close to the airport, including Kaseya Center, the Miami Airport Convention Center, the Port Miami, LoanDepot Park, sunny beaches and great shopping. Succeed in business like never before in 17,878 square feet of event space and interactive event hubs for your next Miami meeting. After a full day of business or sightseeing, refresh in our outdoor pool or treat yourself to American classics at our restaurants. With a state-of-the-art fitness center, multicultural attentive guest service and a complimentary shuttle service to the Miami International Airport (MIA), our hotel is a full-service sanctuary, where your comfort is always a certainty.Marriott

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Miami International Airport
address: 3974 Northwest South River Drive, Miami, FL 33142
description: Welcome to Embassy Suites Hotel - Miami International Airport, a proud member of the Florida GREEN Lodging Program. Our Miami Florida airport hotel offers great year round weather and fantastic Summer Family Vacation Packages and Specials. Our Miami airport hotel is conveniently located just a half mile from MIA and we offer complimentary drop-off and pick-up airport shuttle service. Miami has a diverse and rich culture and our hotel is proud to be a part of it. All major Miami attractions are close by our hotel including the Miami Seaquarium, Jungle Island, historic Coral Gables, Miami's trendy South Beach and of course, the Port of Miami for all your cruise departures. Individual Transfers to the Port of Miami are also available for a Nominal Fee. Reserve your seats upon check-in at our Front Desk! Many of our Miami airport hotel guests experience the following attractions during their stay with us: The Port of Miami for all CRUISE departures! Fantastic Miami Shopping Malls, Outdoor Markets and upscale street venues, The best Golf in Florida at Miami Golf Courses, Miami Spa Services In-Suite, Miami Sports Arena's including homes of the Dolphins, Heat and Marlins! The hip sophistication and international flair of South Beach, Miami Museums, the Miami Zoo and Florida National Parks. Our Miami airport hotel has something to offer travelers from around the world. Miami Florida is an international gateway for businesses, health industries, world commerce and has also become a leading destination for the entertainment industry. South Beach is known around the world as a beacon for international musicians, artists and dance companies. South Beach and downtown Miami are home to some of the top clubs, discothèques and art galleries in the world. Below is a list of just some of the major corporations that have made Miami their home base: Lennar Corporation, The University of Miami, Carnival Cruise Lines Corporation, Burger King Corporation, World Fuel Services, Southern Wine & Spirits Corporation. As we mentioned above, you can't beat the weather in Miami. Our average temperature is 75.9 C and although it gets warmer in the summer months, Miami is a lush, tropical paradise at the southern tip of the Florida peninsula with Key Biscayne just a short drive away and Key West just a three hour drive from our hotel. When you need it bad, we've got it good! Welcome to Miami!Hilton

name: Hilton Miami Airport Blue Lagoon
description: The Hilton Miami Airport Blue Lagoon in Miami, Florida is the premier full service 'resort style' hotel near Miami International Airport. We are a preferred choice for business travel, Miami vacations, and convention guests. This beautiful hotel is situated on a private peninsula in Blue Lagoon and is only a nine-minute complimentary airport shuttle ride from Miami International Airport. Our convenient Miami hotel location is near a number of exciting local attractions including: South Beach, Downtown Miami, Coconut Grove, Coral Gables, Port of Miami (Cruise Port), Miami Beach Convention Center, Brickell Avenue Business District, American Airlines Arena (home of the Miami Heat), Little Havana, Wynwood, Hard Rock Stadium (home of the Miami Dolphins and University of Miami Hurricanes), Marlins Stadium, Florida International University Stadium (home of the Golden Panthers), and Dolphin Mall. The hotel boasts 508 guest rooms including 80 suites that overlook a natural lagoon and the sparkling skyline of downtown Miami, Florida. A wide selection of hotel facilities and services are also available for your enjoyment. Guests enjoy sunbathing in and around the large pool, relaxing in the whirlpool and exercising in the fitness center (featuring Peloton bikes, cardio, resistance and free weights), tennis and basketball courts, and scenic walking/jogging path. This hotel also features international cuisine in its Coral Café restaurant, premium liquors and tropical beverages in its indoor and outdoor bars, Herb n Kitchen (Grab & Go), and Room Service. Meeting planners and attendees will love the hotel's 30,000 sq. ft. of function space, on-site business center, and dedicated event staff members. We cater to 10 – 1,000 people. Our hotel provides real-time flight information for our guests' convenience via a “live” flight display board in the lobby. Several exciting and famous Florida attractions located nearby enrich the Miami experience: Jungle Island, Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, Florida Everglades, The Miami Seaquarium, Miami Metro Zoo, Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts, Actor's Playhouse, Venetian Pool, Key Biscayne, Homestead Speedway, Historic Art Deco District and Bayside Marketplace If traveling on business, our hotel is located near Miami International Airport in the heart of Waterford Blue Lagoon Corporate Business Park, home to a number of companies: Burger King, Hewlett Packard, Oracle, SAP, Visa International, Federal Express, Nokia, Toyota, Caterpillar, Johnson & Johnson, Sony. Additional Information: This premier full service hotel is just 9 minutes from the Miami International Airport for business pleasure.Hilton

name: Hotel St. Michel
description: This historical hotel is in Coral Gables and 6 miles from downtown Miami. This hotel features a tour desk, free Wi-Fi in every room, and an on-site restaurant. Guest rooms at the Hotel St. Michel offer a flat-screen cable TV and hair dryer. A work desk is also provided. Guests at Hotel St. Michel can dine at Zucca Ristorante, which focuses on artisan Italian cuisine. The restaurant is open daily for lunch and dinner. St. Michel Hotel is 3 miles from Kennedy Park, a beach park on the Atlantic Ocean. The University of Miami is within 5 minutes' drive of the hotel. Hotel St. Michel. Coral Gables is o.4 miles from Mircacle Mile's world-class restaurants, culture and tastefully curated shopping experiences all accessible via Trolley.

name: Holiday Inn Miami-International Airport
address: 1111 South Royal Poinciana Boulevard, Miami Springs, FL 33166
description: Just the place for you! Whether you're traveling to Miami for a little fun in the sun or to finalize a business deal! The Holiday Inn® Miami International Airport hotel offers the ideal setting to suit your needs. We offer complimentary 24 hours shuttle service to/from MIA Airport, pick up and drop off on 1st floor, we provide scheduled services to Port of Miami for a nominal fee. The hotel's location is the right choice for corporate travelers who appreciate being close to companies including Airbus, Boeing, Pan Am, Aero Service Training Academy, government offices, US Southern Command and more. You can stay and enjoy amenities like complimentary Wi-Fi Internet access, 24-hour business center, sparkling outdoor pool, fitness center, top floor scenic restaurant and bar along with room service and café. The hotel features 2,480 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space for your meetings or events. Our catering and banquet staff will take care of every detail, assuring a memorable experience. We're in proximity to the Miami Beaches, Downtown, Port of Miami, Art Deco/Wynwood Midtown, Coral Gables, Coconut Grove, Marlin’s Stadium, Loan Depot Stadium, Little Havana, South Beach, Miami Seaquarium and more. Families can create lifelong memories. No matter what brings you to Miami, Florida, our airport hotel's professional staff and service will bring you back for your next visit to Miami!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Aventura Mall
address: 19900 West Country Club Drive, Aventura, FL 33180
description: Explore South Florida in style while enjoying a Residence Inn Miami Aventura Mall hotel suite. Located near Gulfstream Park, our hotel, close to Aventura Mall, makes exploring Miami's top attractions and beaches easy. Choose from our studio, one- and two-bedroom hotel suites and enjoy the comforts of home, like complimentary Wi-Fi, spacious living areas and luxurious bedding. Start your day with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet or make the most of your suite's kitchen to prepare a special homemade meal. Once you've refueled and recharged, stop by our fitness center to work on your cardio. Next, take a refreshing dip in the heated outdoor pool at our hotel in Aventura, surrounded by cozy lounge chairs and swaying palm trees. Hosting an event? With four stylish meeting spaces offering audiovisual equipment, our hotel accommodates everything from business conferences to quinceañeras. So whether you're visiting the beach or going on a cruise, find your home at Residence Inn Miami Aventura Mall.Marriott

name: Hotel Indigo Miami Brickell
description: Relax, work, and embrace the vibe of Miami at Hotel Indigo® Miami Brickell. Located in the upscale Brickell neighborhood, our hotel is steps from the Brickell City Centre with some of the best restaurants, bars, shopping, and entertainment. Ride the free Metromover or trolley to Miami attractions, including the Bayside Marketplace, Kaseya Center, and Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts. Miami Beach, Dolphin Mall, and the most beautiful beaches in South Florida are a quick trip on the Metrorail. Our Brickell hotel puts you near the Port of Miami and 20 minutes from Miami International Airport. Get the edge on business and enjoy local adventures at a uniquely Miami hotel with everything you need—meeting space, an outdoor pool, and a trendy neighborhood eatery.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove
description: Located in Miami, a few steps from Cocowalk Shopping Center, Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has accommodations with free bikes, private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property provides evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel, rooms contain a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, certain accommodations at Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove also feature a sea view. The rooms have a safety deposit box. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has a terrace. Vizcaya Museum is 2.8 miles from the hotel, while University of Miami is 3.2 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.2 miles from Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove.

name: Biltmore Hotel
description: Boasting amenities including an 18-hole golf course and a full-service spa, this historic resort in Coral Gables, Florida is just 4 miles from Miami International Airport. Brickell City Center is 6.2 mi away. University of Miami is 1.6 miles away Robes and linens are offered in each room at the Biltmore Hotel. A 65-inch flat-screen TV and telephone are also included. The Biltmore Hotel offers 10 lighted tennis courts, an outdoor 2300 square yard swimming pool with cabanas, and an on-site fitness center. In addition, the hotel offers over 150 acres of lush tropical landscape and spacious meeting and banquet facilities. Guests staying at the Biltmore can enjoy a variety of gourmet dining options, including contemporary French cuisine at Palme d'Or and classic Italian dishes at Fontana. The hotel also offers classic pub fare at the 19th Hole restaurant and a Sunday Champagne Brunch. Shopping and dining at Village of Merrick Park are just 1.8 miles from this hotel. Guests will be 5.1 miles from Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and 3.3 miles from coconut Grove.

name: Hilton Aventura Miami
description: Our beautiful AAA 4-Diamond hotel is conveniently located across from Aventura Mall and a short drive away from Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood and Miami International Airports, Hard Rock Stadium, Gulfstream Park, Aventura Hospital, and Sunny Isles Beach. A complimentary shuttle is available within a five-mile radius. Indulge in culinary delights at Gala, offering South American-inspired cuisine, and enjoy specially crafted cocktails at MuseBar. We offer two amenity decks and poolside cabanas. Shuttle Service to Aventura Mall, Gulfstream Park, and Sunny Isles Beach is now available from 10:00 am - 6:30 pm daily. Hilton Aventura Miami is the ideal setting for work or play.Hilton

name: SERENA Hotel Aventura Miami, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: The SERENA Hotel Aventura is moments away from world class shopping at Aventura Mall and neighbors to Gulf Stream Park and Casino, where you can enjoy live horse races, fine restaurants, gambling and shopping. We are located in the epicenter of the Aventura Medical District and the nearest hotel to the Aventura Hospital. Enjoy refined contemporary rooms and suites in a relaxed atmosphere. A portion of our suites feature separate living and sleeping areas featuring including a fully equipped kitchen. We offer a full restaurant and bar, a conference room, fitness center and rooftop swimming pool. SERENA is derived from the Latin word serenus, meaning clear, tranquil, or serene. Whether you’ve spent your day under the sun, shopping or working you can unplug and arrive at your place of tranquility.Hilton

name: Red Roof PLUS+ Miami Airport
description: This all nonsmoking hotel is only 5 minutes' drive from Miami International Airport. The hotel offers free airport transfers, and free Wi-Fi. Laundry facilities are also available at this pet-friendly hotel. Guest rooms at the Miami Airport Red Roof Plus are equipped with flat-screen cable TVs and ironing facilities. Some rooms feature microwaves and mini-refrigerators. Miami city center is 10 minutes' drive from the Red Roof Plus, and South Beach is 15 minutes' drive away. Flagler Dog Racing is only 1.9 mi away.

name: Candlewood Suites Miami Exec Airport - Kendall
description: Welcome to the Candlewood Suites Hotel Miami Executive Airport - Kendall. You can enjoy the most modern and convenient extended stay hotel in Kendall. Business travelers and adventure seekers looking for the perfect home away from home, look no further for short term or extended stays in our hotel suites. Our hotel is right next to the Miami Executive Airport and just 20 miles away from Miami International Airport (MIA). With world class shopping centers including The Palms at Town & Country, Dolphin Mall and Dadeland Mall. Also conveniently located just minutes away from Miami Dade College, Baptist Hospital, Zoo Miami, Gold Coast Railroad Museum, Wings over Miami Museum, Kendall Ice Arena, Monkey Jungle, Black Point Marina, Homestead Miami Speedway, Everglades National Park, Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and downtown Miami just a short drive away. Our spacious suites with fully-equipped kitchens, complimentary guest laundry, complimentary parking, 24-hour gazebo and barbecue area, outdoor pool, Fitness Center and signature amenities will make for a perfect stay. Stress free weekly housekeeping services will make for a more relaxing stay. Free high-speed Internet access, large work spaces with a desk chair, and recliner, give you all the comforts you need to stay relaxed.The hotel has a large-scale generator to operate all the areas of the hotel during power outages.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Holiday Inn Express Doral Miami, An IHG Hotel
description: A brand new, fresh, contemporary hotel with spaces that enable guests to be productive, connect with friends, family, and colleagues, and wake up feeling refreshed. Individuals and families stay with us while traveling globally and locally for business and leisure. They seek high-quality, affordable, and reliable choices, and value real, human connection. Located in close proximity to Doral's vibrant shopping districts including, Miami International Mall, Dolphin Mall and CityPlace Doral, our guests have a variety of entertainment options such as, dining, comedy, bowling, movies, nightlife and upscale shopping.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Sole Miami, A Noble House Resort
address: 17315 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: This oceanfront hotel features direct beach access, sea and pool view restaurant with a bar. Shopping, dining and entertainment at Miami Beach are 20 minute's drive away. Aventura Mall and Bal Harbor Shops are both within 3.7 mi of the property. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort hotel guest rooms are furnished with iPod docking stations and flat-screen cable TVs. Suites offer a seating area and all rooms include a private balcony. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort features an outdoor swimming pool with ocean views. Guests can also take advantage of the tour desk for help discovering the area. Miami Beach's historic Art Deco district, which offers unique shops and famous restaurants, is also close by. Oleta River State Park is 10 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Private Ocean Condos at Marenas Beach
address: 18683 Collins Ave, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: With a stay at Private Ocean Condos at Marenas Beach, you'll be centrally located in Sunny Isles Beach, within a 5-minute drive of Aventura Mall and Oleta River State Park. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services.Hotels.com

name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Miami Kendall West
description: Looking for a hotel in Miami can be challenging, therefore the TownePlace Suites Miami Kendall West is the best choice when traveling to South Florida.Our roomy studios come with fully equipped kitchens, smart TV’s, Free Wi-Fi and spacious workstation. We offer great comfort for business and leisure travelers who can enjoy a free hot breakfast buffet. Travelers can prepare their favorite recipe in their studios or grill on the BBQ in our lakeview terrace. What’s unique at our hotel? Guests can socialize in our vibrant full bar.We are within walking distance to West Kendall Baptist Hospital, restaurants, and just minutes away from Miami Executive Airport.Our guests love our proximity to Dadeland Mall and car races at Homestead Speedway. Our strategic location places you at the center of it all - easily wander to downtown Miami, Zoo Miami, Wyndwood Walls, Seaquarium, Bayside MarketPlace and the turquoise beaches of south beach.Marriott

name: Cardozo Hotel South Beach
description: Facing the beachfront, Cardozo Hotel offers 4-star accommodations in Miami Beach and features a shared lounge, terrace and restaurant. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the bar. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. An American breakfast is available daily at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Cardozo Hotel include Lummus Park Beach, South Pointe Park Beach and Art Deco Historic District. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 11 miles from the accommodation.

name: Miccosukee Casino & Resort
description: Miccosukee Resort & Gaming located in Miami along the Southeastern edge of the Florida Everglades, Just 15 minutes west of the Florida Turnpike. A nonsmoking casino and High Stakes Bingo Hall with designated smoking areas outside the building for your convenience. Players of all levels can try their luck on any of the sizzling 2,000+ machines on our floor — from classic games to the most cutting-edge machines featuring the latest gaming innovations, special effects, bonuses and rewards! Standing at the edge of the magnificent Florida Everglades, the Resort features rooms designed with comfort as the number one priority as well as amazing views of the surrounding ecosystem. Deluxe-level, Executive, and Suite rooms are available. Amenities include: Indoor Pool - Fitness Center, Gift Shop, Bar Stations and dining options. All of our rooms conveniently feature Wi-Fi, Premium Cable programing, Pay-per-view, in-room safe, flat screen TV’s and a lot more. Planning a Conference or Event: we offer over 40,000 sq. ft. of flexible space to achieve perfection in our Meeting & banquet conference space. Dining options include laid back Sawgrass Café, serving tasty sandwiches, soups, salads, and Latino favorites like croquetas and pastelitos. know you'll enjoy our appetizing dishes and generous portions. Max’s Our hotdog stand is conveniently located near our gaming floor. You can enjoy food to-go, coffee, soft drinks and more. Our latest edition Café Hammocks, enjoy casual dining with a sophisticated flair. Serves up breakfast, lunch & dinner favorites, right in the middle of the gaming action.
